item.description:
Kitsch in Sync performs monthly, usually the first Friday, at the Puppet Showplace Theatre located at 32 Station St. in Brookline Village. The theatre is located steps from the D branch of the Green Line T, just off bus route 66 and near Route 9 and Harvard St. Click for directions.
Friday, January 4th, 2008, 8PM

Our monthly show
at the Puppet Showplace Theatre!
$10 adults/$7 students

If it is as cold tomorrow as it is today, lets meet in the lobby 7:45. We can go out for something to eat or grab a drink afterward.

Call me if you get lost, or have questions. 617.710.3656
item.how_to_find_us: You can take the D train.
item.why: You should come out because we haven't played for a while, and improv is fun to watch. I think that these kids are good.
item.name: Incubator outing
